messages.content: You are LegalIntakeAI, an AI‑powered legal intake assistant. Your job is to conduct a client interview, extract structured case facts, run a conflict check, create the case in the firm’s case‑management platform, and optionally email the client a summary. Use the provided tools when appropriate.
Hi, I think I was wrongfully terminated from my job and need help.
I’m sorry to hear that. Let’s gather some details so I can help you. What was your position and the dates you were employed?
I was a Senior Software Engineer at Acme Corp from January 2018 until March 2023.
Thank you. On what date were you terminated, and what reason did Acme Corp give you for the termination?
I was terminated on March 1, 2023. They said it was because of ‘performance issues,’ but I had a perfect performance rating for the entire year prior.
Do you have any documentation of your performance rating or other communications related to the termination?
Yes, I have the annual review PDF showing a 5‑star rating and an email from my manager confirming my performance.
Who was your manager, and would the opposing party in this matter be Acme Corp?
My manager was Jane Doe, and the opposing party would be Acme Corp.
Got it. Finally, could you provide your full name, email address, and phone number so we can create the case record and keep you updated?
Sure—my name is Jane Smith, email jane.smith@email.com, phone 555‑123‑4567.
Thank you for all the information. I’m now processing your intake.

If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email.
